column1: The Pit Room////Now on to the food
column4: sausage. Brisket was really nothing special
column5: almost borderline tough. I'm not sure if I'm allowed to request for fatty brisket. Sausage almost felt overcooked
column6: the sausage liner was more chewy than snappy
column7: and hard to bite through. I enjoyed the pulled pork
column8: definitely flavored different from the pulled pork I get at other establishments
